properties.title: ShorelineMonitor: Satellite-Derived Shorelines
properties.description: ShorelineMonitor: Satellite-Derived Shorelines in Parquet format

table:columns.name: shoreline_name
table:columns.description: Name assigned to the shoreline segment. The name consists of the box, the MultiLineString group and the LineString index; i.e., 'box_xx_xx_mlsxx_lsxx'.

table:columns.name: geometry
table:columns.description: Shoreline geometry represented as linestrings, encoded in Well-Known Binary (WKB) format.

table:columns.name: determination_times
table:columns.description: Times of the imagery that are included in the composite image. These are assumed to be UTC.

table:columns.name: start_datetime
table:columns.description: Start datetime refers to the timestamp (ISO 8601 format) of the first image that is included in the composite image.

table:columns.name: end_datetime
table:columns.description: End datetime refers to the timestamp (ISO 8601 format) of the last image that is included in the composite image.

table:columns.name: otsu_threshold
table:columns.description: Threshold value determined by Otsu's method for image binarization.

table:columns.name: otsu_separability
table:columns.description: Measure of the separability between land and water classes as determined by Otsu's method.

table:columns.name: qa_cloud_cover
table:columns.description: Quality assurance (GEE) information regarding cloud cover in the imagery.

table:columns.name: image_id
table:columns.description: Identifier for the source composite image used to derive the shoreline.

table:columns.name: box_id
table:columns.description: Unique identifier for the shoreline box within the global ShorelineMonitor system.

table:columns.name: source_filename
table:columns.description: Name of the original file from which shoreline data was processed.

table:columns.name: group
table:columns.description: Identifier for multi-linestring groups/segments within the source ShorelineMonitor data as exported from GEE.

table:columns.name: quadkey
table:columns.description: QuadKey (zoom level 7) for spatial indexing, representing the spatial location of the shoreline segment.

data.title: ShorelineMonitor Satellite-Derived Shorelines
data.description: ShorelineMonitor Parquet dataset with Satellite-Derived Shorelines for this region.
